description: This file contains a shell script that manages firmware upgrade timing and reboot conditions, including extracting maintenance times, current time, and removing scheduled reboot crons.

methods.name: ExtractMaintenanceTime
methods.description: Reads and sets firmware maintenance window start and end times from specific files or defaults.

methods.name: ExtractcurrentTime
methods.description: Calculates and outputs current time, comparing with firmware upgrade window times.

methods.name: Removecron
methods.description: Removes an auto-reboot parameter from the scheduled crontab.
